import math

def shell_sort(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    gap = n // 2
    while gap > 0:
        for i in range(gap, n):
            temp = arr[i]
            j = i
            while j >= gap and arr[j - gap] > temp:
                arr[j] = arr[j - gap]
                j -= gap
            arr[j] = temp
        gap = gap // 2
    return arr

def shell_sort_with_gap(arr, gap):
    n = len(arr)
    for g in gap:
        for i in range(g, n):
            temp = arr[i]
            j = i
            while j >= g and arr[j - g] > temp:
                arr[j] = arr[j - g]
                j -= g
            arr[j] = temp
    return arr

arr = [64, 34, 25, 12, 22, 11, 90]
gap1 = [5, 3, 1]
gap2 = [4, 1]
gap3 = [3, 1]

result1 = shell_sort_with_gap(arr.copy(), gap1)
result2 = shell_sort_with_gap(arr.copy(), gap2)
result3 = shell_sort_with_gap(arr.copy(), gap3)

print(result1)
print(result2)
print(result3)
prompt: Shell Sort algoritmasını farklı gap dizileriyle uygula.
